alert.note: Alert for Stoddard (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 4:29PM CDT until August 05 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Stoddard County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 429 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dexter, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dexter, Bernie, Essex, Baker and Penermon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
